description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Flash Cards for Kids - created to display the ABC's, Numbers, Colors, Shapes, and more.  Never worry about losing flashcards around the house, use the included voice acting, or turn off the sound.  Now includes a demo mini game, more to come!  Future updates are planned to include more content/languages. Ages 0-4 and up.
